alert.note: Alert for Henry; Mercer; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:23AM CDT until June 25 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Eastern Mercer County in northwestern Illinois... Southern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 623 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Colona to near Seaton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... East Moline, Silvis, Colona, Coal Valley, Orion, Warner, Carbon Cliff, Green River, Sunny Hill and Sunny Hill Estates around 630 AM CDT. Osco and Morristown around 635 AM CDT. Shale City, Gilchrist, Wanlock and Old Gilchrist around 640 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Geneseo, Viola, Atkinson, New Windsor, North Henderson, New Windsor, Alpha and Woodhull. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
